name: Week of the Dove
description:
It's Alinne's first day on the job. Not only does she have to heal the wounded, but also teach the next generation of healers. And then there's her handsome but confusing drinking buddy.  

Too much responsibility? Luckily, there's some handy guidelines to proper triage.

Week of the Dove was developed in RPG Maker MV. It plays directly in the browser. 

Got any feedback? I'd love to hear it!
